title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers (Leader
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers (Leader
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers (Leader 

and Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (leader minister environment climate communications) order 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers (Leader
heading: 2. Each of the following persons particulars of each of whose address have
text_raw:
2. Each of the following persons particulars of each of whose address have 
been deposited at the office of the Department of the Environment, Climate and 
Communications, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister of the 
Government who is the leader of a political party registered in the Register of 
Political Parties and Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications 
with effect from 9 April 2024. 

(a) 

John McDonald; 

(b) Paul Kenny; 

(c) Edel Hackett. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

28 May, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 31st May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [282] 3
